sentences.english: Choroidal folds in the macular area suggest hypotony .
sentences.chinese: 黄斑区脉络膜皱褶提示张力减退。

sentences.english: The child's dress is neatly gathered at the neck.
sentences.chinese: 孩子的衣服在领口处打着整齐的皱褶。

sentences.english: Any of a breed of domestic pigeons having a small crested head and a ruffled breast.
sentences.chinese: 浮羽鸽家鸽的一个品种，头小有冠，有皱褶的胸部。
选择那些不起皱褶的衣物。

sentences.english: We applied the new modifier Skin Morph to correct the deformations in the pleats.
sentences.chinese: 我们运用了新的皮肤变形修改器去做皱褶的变形。

sentences.english: She smoothed the creases out with an electric iron .
sentences.chinese: 她用电熨斗把皱褶烫平。

sentences.english: Are you ready to see the frilled lizard in full scare mode?
sentences.chinese: 你准备好看处于完全恐吓模式下的皱褶蜥蜴了吗？

sentences.english: Her skirt had bunched up round her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她的裙子在腰际成皱褶收拢。

sentences.english: Northern Australia is a hotbed of exotic animals, including the frilled lizard.
sentences.chinese: 北澳大利亚是奇异动物的温床，包括皱褶蜥蜴。

sentences.english: This fuchsia ruche chiffon blouse is a little too dramatic.
sentences.chinese: 这件粉红色细皱褶的雪纺纱罩衫有点太引人注目了。

sentences.english: Northern Australia is a hotbed of exotic animals, including the frilled  lizard.
sentences.chinese: 北澳大利亚是奇异动物的温床，包括皱褶蜥蜴。

sentences.english: As you can see, the whole point of this exercise was to get the frilled lizard on the run.
sentences.chinese: 正如你看到的，这个练习的全部就是让皱褶蜥蜴逃跑。

sentences.english: In lower eyelid surgery, the incision is made just below the lashes in the skin's natural crease.
sentences.chinese: 下眼睑手术时，沿睫毛下皮肤皱褶方向切开。

sentences.english: The frill is that ruff-like collar it uses to bluff its enemies, like feral cats.
sentences.chinese: 皱褶是用于吓唬敌人的轮状衣领，就像野猫一样。

sentences.english: Whether you undergo surgery to improve vision or appearance, eyelid drooping can recur over time.
sentences.chinese: 下眼睑手术时，沿睫毛下皮肤皱褶方向切开。

sentences.english: Thesheets on my bed have rucked up.
sentences.chinese: 她弄平了床单上的皱褶。

definition: variant of 皺褶|皱褶[zhou4 zhe3]
fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
